twcore.core.lvz
Class LvzManager

java.lang.Object
  twcore.core.lvz.Objset
      twcore.core.lvz.LvzManager

public class LvzManager
extends Objset

This class does advanced Lvz operations using the extended protocol. It allows complete control over almost every aspect of lvz objects, and is a subclass of Objset so it can still be used for all of those functions. Note that while it does keep track of the status of the objects, it is only aware of the data it is provided, so unless you set a property of an object it will not be recorded in the LvzObject.

Version:
06.02.11
Author:
D1st0rt

doChanges

public void doChanges(boolean clearQueue)
Executes queued modifications for all objects by sending the object modify packet to the entire arena

Parameters:
clearQueue - whether to clear the queue after the packet has been sent

doChanges

public void doChanges(short playerID,
                      boolean clearQueue)
Executes queued modifications for all objects by sending the object modify packet to the specified player

Parameters:
playerID - the player to send the object modifications to
clearQueue - whether to clear the queue after the packet has been sent

getObjectSafely

public LvzObject getObjectSafely(short id)
Safely retrieves a LvzObject object with the specified id

Parameters:
id - the id of the intended object
Returns:
the object with the specified id. If it does not exist a new object is created, added to the collection and returned.
